hero.title: Support Engineer @ Accenture | Infrastructure Manager | Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Support Engineer @ Accenture | Infrastructure Manager | Full Stack Developer
hero.bio:
Support Engineer at Accenture for enterprise mining operations and IT Infrastructure Manager at Jujuy Water Utility.
Experience in level 3 technical support, networks, servers, and DevOps, ensuring 24/7 operational continuity of critical systems.
My background in Full Stack Development (Angular, Java, Spring) and advanced English level (C2) allows me to add value to complex international projects, from infrastructure to code.
